CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y 	git 	gconf2 	gconf-service 	gvfs-bin 	libasound2 	libcap2 	libgconf-2-4 	libgnome-keyring-dev 	libgtk2.0-0 	libnotify4 	libnss3 	libxkbfile1 	libxss1 	libxtst6 	xdg-utils 	--no-install-recommends 	&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: buildDeps=' 		ca-certificates 		curl 	' 	&& set -x 	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends 	&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* 	&& curl -sSL https://github.com/atom/atom/releases/download/v${ATOM_VERSION}/atom-amd64.deb -o /tmp/atom-amd64.deb 	&& dpkg -i /tmp/atom-amd64.deb 	&& rm -rf /tmp/*.deb 	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove $buildDeps
